comment._content: Wow, they don't look very pleased with the idea. Great costumes though!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/92826045@N02] Indeed, not a very happy bunch :)

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Once upon a time, these 'all nations' fetes were all the rage at schools...loving parents would shoe horn their less than enthusiastic children into 'national costumes'...good to see a polar explorer in the mix!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Exactly, my own grandmother and mother have images of the elaborate home-made costumes they used to create for school events - and always a different national costume! Indians seem to be quite popular in this image! Cheers, Penny
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
